channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nike's turnaround is delayed but not derailed. We think it's worth the wait
item.description: Severe issues in China and a weak outlook discouraged investors, sending Nike shares down sharply.

item.title: Micron forecasts surging revenue as computer memory demand for AI remains high
item.description: The high demand for memory has driven Micron shares higher and they are up 168% in 2025.

item.title: Nike shares drop 10% as China sales plunge, tariffs hit profits
item.description: Investors are rattled by Nike's weak performance in China, despite fiscal second-quarter earnings and revenue that topped Wall Street's expectations.

item.title: Olive Garden owner Darden Restaurants hikes revenue outlook as value plays help bring in diners
item.description: Darden Restaurants reported strong demand for Olive Garden and LongHorn Steakhouse.

item.title: Micron stock pops 10% as AI memory demand soars: 'We are more than sold out'
item.description: Micron said it expects the total addressable market for high-bandwidth memory to hit $100 billion by 2028.
